statements: SELECT * FROM contract_compliance_monitor;
SELECT contract_id, vendor_name, contract_value FROM contract_compliance_monitor WHERE delivery_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM contract_compliance_monitor WHERE vendor_name = 'Vendor A';
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date FROM contract_compliance_monitor ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, kpi_compliance_percentage FROM contract_compliance_monitor WHERE kpi_compliance_percentage > 90;
SELECT * FROM contract_compliance_monitor WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vendor_name, contract_value FROM contract_compliance_monitor WHERE contract_value > 10000 ORDER BY contract_value DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_contracts, AVG(kpi_compliance_percentage) AS avg_kpi_compliance FROM contract_compliance_monitor WHERE delivery_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM contract_compliance_monitor WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(contract_value) AS max_contract_value, MIN(contract_value) AS min_contract_value FROM contract_compliance_monitor WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%Company%' AND kpi_compliance_percentage >= 90;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date, amount, status FROM contracts;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, vendor_id, status FROM contracts WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT contract_name, start_date, end_date, amount FROM contracts ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date, amount, status FROM contracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE vendor_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, amount FROM contracts WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date, amount FROM contracts WHERE amount > 10000 AND status NOT LIKE '%Cancelled%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT c.contract_name, k.kpi_name, k.target_value, k.actual_value, k.variance FROM contracts c JOIN kpis k ON c.contract_id = k.contract_id WHERE k.variance > 0 ORDER BY k.variance DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT k.kpi_name, AVG(k.actual_value) AS avg_actual_value FROM kpis k GROUP BY k.kpi_name HAVING AVG(k.actual_value) < 5000 ORDER BY avg_actual_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_id, vendor_name, contract_value FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_value DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_start_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contract_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpi_tracking WHERE kpi_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_value FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_value DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_value > 10000;
SELECT contracts.vendor_name, contract_compliance.compliance_status FROM contracts JOIN contract_compliance ON contracts.contract_id = contract_compliance.contract_id;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value, kpi_date FROM kpi_tracking WHERE kpi_value > 500 AND kpi_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM contract;
SELECT contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM contract;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor;
SELECT contract_name, value FROM contract WHERE value > 100000;
SELECT contract_id, status, compliance_date FROM compliance_status;
SELECT contract_name, start_date, end_date, value FROM contract WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date, vendor_name FROM contract c JOIN vendor v ON c.vendor_id = v.vendor_id;
SELECT contract_name, start_date, end_date, vendor_id FROM contract WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT c.contract_name, v.vendor_name, cs.compliance_date, cs.status FROM contract c JOIN vendor v ON c.vendor_id = v.vendor_id JOIN compliance_status cs ON c.contract_id = cs.contract_id;
SELECT k.metric_name, k.metric_value, k.metric_date, c.contract_name FROM kpi k JOIN contract c ON k.contract_id = c.contract_id WHERE k.metric_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_location ASC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM contracts WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM performance_indicators WHERE contract_id = 1001 ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT review_id, review_date, review_notes FROM contract_reviews WHERE contract_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_name, indicator_value FROM performance_indicators ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_date >= '2021-01-01' AND log_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, review_date, review_notes FROM contract_reviews WHERE review_notes LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
